dublin_core.dcvalue: It has recently been accepted that periodontal disease is a risk factor for not only tooth loss but also systemic diseases An effective system of public intervention for periodontal health to enable continuous intervention of dental professionals has been sought We developed a Web based intervention system regarding periodontal health and evaluated the effects of the system in the workplace
Medical informatics and the Internet in medicine
Development of Web-based intervention system for periodontal health: a pilot study in the workplace.
